title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin believes the Lakers should consider making a big trade that no one would expect in order to rebuild their roster. He sends out a warning to several NFL teams who are settling for their current quarterbacks and why they'll never contend for a Super Bowl until they make a change. He believes the NBA has a new tanking problem, but it's a superstar player instead of a team this time. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First joins the show to decipher if Aaron Rodgers will return to the Packers next season. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
